values: The Pleasures of God’s Faithfulness: Reflections on Bethlehem’s 150 YearsThe Pleasures of God’s Faithfulness: Reflections on Bethlehem’s 150 Years

In 2021, Bethlehem Baptist celebrated 150 years as a church. As part of the celebration service, former pastor John Piper reflects on how a church could endure, and bear fruit, over generations.In 2021, Bethlehem Baptist celebrated 150 years as a church. As part of the celebration service, former pastor John Piper reflects on how a church could endure, and bear fruit, over generations.
